attributes.action: Let our children repeat the school year!
attributes.background: Our children have suffered through this pandemic and been taught at home by parents. Parents have been trying to work from home and teach their children which has resulted in children being at a disadvantage from being out of the school environment for nearly a year. Give them it back!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow children to retake the school year to catch-up: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572383

All pupils to repeat this current academic year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
